author: cmlenz
msg: - Remove inner class, AntTestCase implements BuildListener itself now
- Don't hide exceptions thrown by the test methods if the tearDown() method throws an exception

author: cmlenz
msg: Add support for nested <xmlcatalog> elements. Note: normally, the web-app DTDs are resolved automatically against copies of the DTDs in the cactus-ant.jar. However, for testing, we need a way to supply other DTDs, because the JAR has not yet been built at test time.

author: cmlenz
msg: Change the strategy for XMLCatalog support: if the user specifies an XMLCatalog, it will be used instead of the built-in resolver

author: cmlenz
msg: Fix type: filter definition instead of security constraint

author: vmassol
msg: Display even better information when exception is thrown
